iti39:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti39:2.1: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has two approaches to teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.4: this is the first approach to teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.5: ‘Having seen evil as evil, be disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed from it’—
iti39:2.6: this is the second approach to teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.7: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has these two approaches to teaching Dhamma.”
iti39:2.8: That is what the Buddha said.
iti39:3.3: used by the Realized One, the Buddha,
iti39:4.3: Then, with a mind free of desire,
iti39:4.4: you will make an end of suffering.”
iti39:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
